reuters.title: MERRY LAND AND INVESTMENT <MERY> TO OFFER STOCK
reuters.body: Merry Land and Investment Co Inc said it will offer two million shares of common stock for sale. Merry Land said it filed a registration statement with the Security and Exchange Commission. It also said the sale will be offered through an underwriting group managed by <Johnson, Lane, Space, Smith and Co Inc>, and Interstate Securities Corp <IS>. Proceeds will be used to reduce short-term debt, the company said. Reuter 
